dmca.title: Notification of Copyright Infringement @ http://www.bdr130.net/vb/
dmca.body:
Please note that the URL referenced in your DMCA notice does not reside
within our network as of 3:15:34 p.m. (GMT-6) on September 11, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet
 
 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Howard G Spinks [mailto:licensing@vbulletin.com] Posted At: 
> Saturday, September 09, 2006 4:51 AM Posted To: Legal Response
> Conversation: Notification of Copyright Infringement @ 
> http://www.bdr130.net/vb/
> Subject: RE: Notification of Copyright Infringement @ 
> http://www.bdr130.net/vb/
> 
> 
> Hello Abuse
> 
> Whois still returns your network, the site pings to an IP listed to 
> you and the domain owner who is also always helpful states the site is

> no longer a client of his long since.
> 
> Am I missing something here as I must admit to being confused at 
> present as the site is live.
> 
> I do note the DNS now shows SUSPENDED-FOR.SPAM-AND-ABUSE.COM which 
> does not seem to exist.
> 
> Regards
> 
> Howard
> 
> Howard G Spinks
> Snr. Investigator
> Pirate Reports
> PO Box 36
> EAST MOLESEY
> Surrey
> KT8 9XT
> ENGLAND

> Email:        HowardS@piratereports.com
> MSN:        Piratereports
> 
> www.piratereports.com
> 
> 
> 
> 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Legal Response [mailto:LegalResponse@theplanet.com]
> Sent: Friday, September 08, 2006 9:42 PM
> To: licensing@vbulletin.com
> Subject: FW: Notification of Copyright Infringement @ 
> http://www.bdr130.net/vb/

> Legal Response Team
> The Planet
>  
> 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Howard G Spinks [mailto:licensing@vbulletin.com] Posted At:
> Friday, September 08, 2006 11:31 AM Posted To: Legal Response
> Conversation: Notification of Copyright Infringement @ 
> http://www.bdr130.net/vb/
> Subject: Notification of Copyright Infringement @

> 
> 
> NOTIFICATION OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT
> 
> Date: 08 September 2006
> 
> Greetings
> 
> I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of Jelsoft Enterprises 
> Limited who exclusively own vBulletin, a forum Software.
> 
> I can find no record of this user purchasing a site license for this 
> location http://www.bdr130.net/vb/
> 
> Please suspend/remove the GUI and files and prevent future abuse.
> 
> NB: If at your own prerogative you offer your client an opportunity to

> remove the site themselves or purchase a license as opposed to your 
> removal or suspension of service, please be aware that Jelsoft 
> Enterprises Ltd.
> whilst happy to respect your goodwill gesture, in no way requests or 
> requires such action from you and reserves the right to decline the 
> license purchase and refund the fee.  Copyright protection not revenue

> collection is our primary concern and motivation and some forum 
> content if it damages others or breaks our AUP is not allowed.
> 
> Formality:
> 
> Please expeditiously "take down" or "block access" to the infringing 
> material and take appropriate action against the customer to prevent 
> future abuse.
> 
> Declaration:
> 
> I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an 
> agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual

> property rights, said exclusive owners being named:
> 
> Jelsoft Enterprises Ltd., Tagra, Birch Lane, Ascot, Berkshire, SL5 
> 8RF, ENGLAND
> 
> I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below 
> are not authorized by the above intellectual property owners, their 
> agents, or the law and therefore infringe their rights.
> 
> I further aver that the information contained in the Notice is
accurate.
> 
> Software:        vBulletin v3
> 
> I may be contacted at:
